reviews.review: Yes please, may I have another?!

2 1/2 hours of pure joy.   This is not a perfect movie; however, the Russo Bros. pulled off a feat that is merits commendations from both the film industry and cinema-goers.  In a nut shell: fantastic action; incredible usage of IMAX cameras for shots/scenes; WONDERFUL character development (Thanos); timely and appropriate humor and very satisfying end that leaves the audience wanting, re: The Empire Strikes Back.  Cannot wait to see again and again.  I highly recommend.  Enjoy!!
Wasn't as exciting as I thought it would be. As a little to slow placed? knew from the beginning with the pace that there'd be a second one.

A lot to process. Overall, the detail included is outstanding, the care that went into making this film stands out. In the end, it amounts to a lot of smashing and breaking, but I question whether it was an all-timer. 

Positives
1. The work on Thanos - the detail in his face was the best CGI yet. 
2. The return of Red Skull was the biggest shock to me.
3. They didn't get carried away with love stories. 
4. Pepper Potts back as a hero, carrying over from Ironman III?
5. They did not get carried away with jokes. 

Negatives
1. Star Lord not being able to hold it together for 5 more seconds. 
2. The story is constantly shifting to this planet, then this planet, then this planet over here. Starts to feel very redundant. 
3. Not sure what the heck Vision was doing in this movie besides always needing saving. Complete dud.
captain america winter soldier still the best marvel movie

Wow! Non stop heart throbbing action from start to finish! Greatest movie I have ever seen! Wow! My jaw is still on the floor. The ending was absolutely incredible! It's been 4 hours since I've watched it and I'm still shocked and blown away! Simply Wow!
All I will say about this movie is this: it lives up to the hype.  But considering the hype has been building for over TEN YEARS, that's about the highest praise it could receive!
It was amazing lots if surprises
An epic journey unlike anything we have ever scene in cinema
Best MCU Film to date in my Opinion. Total silence in the cinema in the last 5 Minutes of the movie. I was holding my breath and sitting at the edge of my seat the whole time
